description: Writing clean, efficient code is something I really enjoy. I teach embedded systems and C at UQ, and have used those skills across internships. I also have a background in electrical.

skills.name: C (Embedded, Windows, Linux)
skills.description: I've used C to create security exploits for work and wrote code for STM32 and Atmel devices in projects. I've taught C courses for 2 years.

skills.name: Embedded Systems
skills.description: I teach C on Atmel microcontrollers and have worked with STM32 in university projects, and I co-created an embedded cooperative pathfinding algorithm.

skills.name: Electrical/Electronics
skills.description: I'm studying as a qualified electrical engineer, which includes analysis and applied design of circuit theory.

skills.name: Security
skills.description: I've written Windows vulnerability exploits in C and completed multiple security courses.
